channel.title: CVE Feed for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-Q Series Q26UDPVCPU
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-Q Series Q26UDPVCPU

item.title: CVE-2024-1917|2024-05-24T07:41:08.628Z -- Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-Q Series Q26UDPVCPU
item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation MELSEC-Q Series and MELSEC-L Series CPU modules allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute malicious code on a target product by sending a specially crafted packet.

item.title: CVE-2024-1916|2024-05-24T07:39:24.196Z -- Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-Q Series Q26UDPVCPU
item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation MELSEC-Q Series and MELSEC-L Series CPU modules allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute malicious code on a target product by sending a specially crafted packet.

item.title: CVE-2024-0803|2024-05-24T07:35:51.571Z -- Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-Q Series Q26UDPVCPU

item.title: CVE-2024-0802|2024-05-24T07:33:13.583Z -- Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-Q Series Q26UDPVCPU
item.description: Incorrect Pointer Scaling vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation MELSEC-Q Series and MELSEC-L Series CPU modules allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to read arbitrary information from a target product or execute malicious code on a target product by sending a specially crafted packet.
